lines.text: [encouraging Nanette to make a play for the much older, but well-to-do, Henri]
Love has its place -- but it puts no butter on the table.
Leon thinks only of his farm. But we, we could have a wonderful time in Paris, you and I.
A man your age isn't meant for marriage.
I knew it was too good to be true. That much happiness just wasn't meant for me.
Henri Cassin is no more. I caught him. I killed him.
